hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="rabbitmq-server" published_version="3.7.4"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then sudo apt-get update available_version=$(sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Availabel version in repo is $available_version" echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- sudo apt-get update -y sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-8-jdk erlang openssl wget tar xz-utils make python xsltproc rsync git zip
#build and install elixir git clone https://github.com/elixir-lang/elixir cd elixir git checkout v1.6.1 make sudo make install elixir --version
#Install hex cd .. git clone https://github.com/hexpm/hex.git cd hex && git checkout v0.17.3 mix install mix hex.info
sudo apt-get install -y locales sudo locale-gen en_US.UTF-8 export LANG="en_US.UTF-8" export LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
# Build rabbitmq cd .. wget https://dl.bintray.com/rabbitmq/all/rabbitmq-server/3.7.4/rabbitmq-server-3.7.4.tar.xz tar -xf rabbitmq-server-3.7.4.tar.xz cd rabbitmq-server-3.7.4 sudo cp ../hex/_build/dev/lib/hex/ebin/* deps/.mix/archives/hex-0.17.3/hex-0.17.3/ebin/ make sudo make install
sudo mkdir -p /etc/rabbitmq echo "[{rabbit, [{loopback_users, []}]}]." | sudo tee /etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq.config sudo ln -s $PWD/plugins deps/rabbit/plugins sudo deps/rabbit/scripts/rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management sudo deps/rabbit/scripts/rabbitmq-server -detached
sleep 300 curl http://localhost:15672
